name: sweet-scent
effect: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team’s evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team’s evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.
